name: Eiffel Tower
description: An iconic wrought-iron structure built in 1889, offering stunning views of Paris from its observation decks.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island, symbolizing freedom and democracy.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A massive ancient wall stretching thousands of miles, built to protect Chinese states and empires.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, known for its sophisticated dry-stone construction.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A world-famous performing arts center with a distinctive sail-like design, located on Bennelong Point.

name: Taj Mahal
description: A breathtaking white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Ancient monumental structures built as tombs for pharaohs, showcasing incredible architectural precision.

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island known for its whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and stunning sunsets.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive natural wonder carved by the Colorado River, offering breathtaking views and hiking opportunities.

name: Petra
description: An archaeological city famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.

name: Venice Canals
description: A romantic city built on water, famous for its intricate canal system and beautiful gondola rides.

name: Mount Fuji
description: Japan's tallest mountain and an iconic symbol of the country, popular for climbing and photography.

name: Banff National Park
description: A stunning park known for its turquoise lakes, majestic mountains, and abundant wildlife.

name: Angkor Wat
description: The largest religious monument in the world, originally constructed as a Hindu temple.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A massive statue of Jesus Christ atop Corcovado Mountain, offering panoramic views of Rio.

name: Northern Lights
description: A mesmerizing natural light display visible in polar regions, caused by solar particles interacting with Earth's atmosphere.

name: Serengeti National Park
description: A vast wildlife reserve known for its annual Great Migration and diverse animal species.

name: Big Ben
description: An iconic clock tower at the north end of the Houses of Parliament, symbolizing British history.

name: Iguazu Falls
description: A breathtaking series of waterfalls surrounded by lush rainforest, shared between Argentina and Brazil.

name: Dubai Burj Khalifa
description: The tallest building in the world, offering luxury shopping, dining, and panoramic city views.

name: Bora Bora
description: A tropical paradise known for its crystal-clear lagoon, overwater bungalows, and vibrant coral reefs.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: The first national park in the world, famous for geysers like Old Faithful and diverse wildlife.

name: Acropolis of Athens
description: An ancient citadel housing several historical buildings, including the Parthenon.

name: Uluru (Ayers Rock)
description: A massive sandstone monolith sacred to Indigenous Australians, known for its changing colors at sunset.

name: Halong Bay
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring thousands of limestone karsts and isles in emerald waters.

name: Plitvice Lakes National Park
description: A forest reserve with cascading lakes and waterfalls, connected by wooden walkways.

name: Chichen Itza
description: An ancient Mayan city known for its pyramid El Castillo and rich cultural heritage.

name: Victoria Falls
description: One of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world, known locally as 'The Smoke That Thunders'.

name: Reykjavik
description: The capital of Iceland, known for its colorful houses, geothermal pools, and proximity to natural wonders.

name: Safari in Serengeti
description: Experience Africa's Big Five animals in their natural habitat during this unforgettable wildlife adventure.

name: Prague Castle
description: One of the largest ancient castles in the world, offering stunning views of Prague's skyline.

name: Santorini Caldera
description: A volcanic crater filled with deep blue waters, offering dramatic views and luxury resorts.

name: Galápagos Islands
description: A unique archipelago known for its endemic species and Charles Darwin's theory of evolution.

name: Kyoto Temples
description: Home to historic Buddhist temples, Shinto shrines, and traditional tea houses.

name: Barcelona Sagrada Familia
description: Antoni Gaudí’s unfinished basilica, renowned for its unique architecture and intricate details.

name: Great Ocean Road
description: A scenic coastal drive featuring the Twelve Apostles limestone stacks rising from the ocean.

name: Stonehenge
description: A prehistoric monument consisting of massive standing stones arranged in a circular layout.

name: Patagonia
description: A remote region known for its rugged landscapes, glaciers, and diverse wildlife.

name: Maldives Beaches
description: A tropical paradise with pristine white-sand beaches, crystal-clear waters, and luxurious resorts.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient amphitheater that was once used for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles.

name: Matterhorn
description: A towering Alpine peak straddling the Swiss-Italian border, popular among climbers and skiers.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A powerful waterfall system attracting millions of visitors annually for its beauty and energy.

name: Amazon Rainforest
description: The world's largest tropical rainforest, teeming with biodiversity and indigenous cultures.

name: St. Petersburg Hermitage Museum
description: One of the largest and oldest museums in the world, housing millions of artworks and artifacts.

name: Mount Everest
description: The highest mountain in the world, attracting adventurers and mountaineers from across the globe.

name: Blue Lagoon
description: A geothermal spa with warm, mineral-rich waters, offering relaxation amidst lava fields.
